statement.p: The graph below shows the distance a cat is from his bowl of milk over time. Which sentence is a good match for the graph?Â

ol.li: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 4 feet per second.
The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
The cat was 8 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 4 seconds.
The cat was 8 feet away from the milk and ran away from it at a rate of 4 feet per second.
The cat was 4 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 8 seconds.

ul.li: B: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
